name: Hot & Spicy Baked Yam Fries
description: A better burger companion than fries! One of our most popular recipes.

ingredients.name: large yams
ingredients.additionalInstruction: scrubbed, unpeeled and cut into thin wedges

preparation: Toss yams in oil and sriracha seasoning and place in a single layer on a Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper. Coarsely grind Salt and Pepper overtop.
Bake for 20 minutes. Turn yam wedges over and bake an additional 15 minutes, or until potatoes are crisp and golden. Sprinkle with Chili Flakes & Garlic Topper and serve hot.

products.name: Sea Salt (Grinder)
summary: Crisp, clean salt from the sea.

products.name: Chili Flakes & Garlic Topper
summary: Chili & garlic are a match made in heaven—spicy, crunchy & delicious!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
